title: Words are not enough
creator_credit: Basic Films, Leon Clore and Fred Moore
brief_description: Problems of communication arise at all levels of human relationship, including management and workers. Communication structures become more complex as the distance between boardroom and shop floor increase, and as specialists and functional managers authority become confused with line management. Stimulates constructive thought and discussion rather than suggests techniques.
